subject: SUPREME HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE
body:
SUPREME HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE UNITED STATES.
1 First St NE, Washington, DC 20543, USA
From: John Roberts, of the United States
FUND ORDER : ($15.500,000.00)
ATTENTION EMAIL BENEFICIARY, OVER-DUE PAYMENT RELEASED. FINALLY, YOUR FUND IS NOW HERE IN THE USA AWAITING TO BE SHIPPED TO YOUR ADDRESS WITH DUE RESPECT OF THIS HONORABLE COURT UNITED STATE SUPREME COURT UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, WE WANT TO INFORM YOU THAT WE HAVE DISCOVERED A TRANSACTION BETWEEN YOU AND AFRICA UNITS, ACCORDING TO THE INVESTIGATION MADE IT HAS COME TO OUR NOTICE THAT YOU ARE THE REAL BENEFICIARY OF THE SAID FUNDS ONLY THAT YOU WERE DEALING WITH THE WRONG ONES.
YOUR $15.5 MILLION UNITED STATE DOLLARS WAS FORWARDED TO THIS COURT ON MONDAY AFTER ALL THE INVESTIGATION MADE BY FBI, HOME LAND SECURITIES, AND DC POLICE AND WE HAVE MANDATED TO PAY YOU YOUR FUNDS THROUGH THE AUTHORITY OF THIS NY COURT WHICH FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF WASHINGTON DC WILL TAKE CARE OF THE CERTIFIED CHECK THE WHOLE FUNDS WILL BE WRITTEN IN CHECK OR INTO ATM CARD, FOR THIS SPECIAL ARRANGEMENT YOUR COMPLY IS MUCH NEEDED FOR US TO MAKE SURE THAT EVERYTHING MOVE SUCCESSFULLY AND YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR TOTAL FUNDS WITHOUT ANY HITCH .
YOU ADVICE TO STOP ANY COMMUNICATION THAT YOU ARE HAVING WITH ANY OFFICE LIKE DIPLOMATIC AGENT , MONEY GRAM, BANKS, AND COURIER COMPANIES OR ANY FORCES BECAUSE THEY CANNOT DELIVER ANY FUND TO YOU WHILE THEY HAVE BEEN BLOCKED BY OUR NY STATE SUPREME COURT IN COLLABORATION WITH US FEDERAL RESERVE SYSTEM THAT ANY AMOUNT OF MONEY COMING MUST BE DIRECTED TO OUR COURT TO AVOID MONEY LAUNDERING AND TO PROTECT ALL CITIZEN ANY MONEY SEND TO THIS AGENCIES WILL BE REGRETTED BE WISE.
FINALLY YOU NEED TO GET BACK WITH US AND LET ME KNOW IF YOU ARE INTERESTED TO RECEIVE YOUR OVERDUE PAYMENT AS WELL?
FOR MORE COMPREHENSIVE INFORMATION KINDLY PROVIDE YOUR FULL CONTACT DETAILS.
1. YOUR FULL NAME:....
2. FULL ADDRESS:...
3.CELL PHONE:....
4. OCCUPATION:.....
5. 
ID CARD COPY
:.....
YOURS SINCERELY.
CHIEF JUSTICE OF THE SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES.
HON. JOHN G. ROBERTS JR
Email:  
supremecourtofunitedstate15567@gmail.com

subject: Re: SUPREME HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE
body:
Hello Hon. John G. Roberts Jr,

Wow, this is quite a surprise! I can't believe my luck that such a large sum of money has been discovered in my name. It's like a dream come true!

I'm curious though, how did you find out about this? And why was the fund forwarded to the court? Also, could you please explain more about the process of receiving these funds?

I'm really excited and looking forward to your response.

Thank you so much for reaching out to me with this amazing news!

Best wishes,
Janet

subject: Re: SUPREME HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE
body:
Attention Beneficiary Janet, Thank you very much for your urgent response,
I am official hereby to let you know that we have 4 means which you can use
to receive your Fund and you are expected to choose your suitable option
below okay.

Here are the options:

(1) Bank to Bank wire transfer: It will take only 24 hours for you to receive
your donation fund into your preferred bank account. Bank will only charge
you $350.00?

(2) ATM Card delivery: It will take 24 hours for you to receive your ATM Card
with your fund worth of US$15.5 Million United State Dollars inside the
card. The maximum amount you can withdraw daily is  US$15,500. The delivery
company will charge you only $250.00 for their delivery cost?

(3) Consignment Box Delivery: Your fund will be sealed in a Box without anyone
knowing what is inside it and it will be delivered to your house in cash.
It will take 24 hours to be delivered to your house. This Cash Consignment
Box delivery will only cost you $450.00?

However: The above mentioned 3 options are the medium which you can use to
receive your Fund safely.

I await your urgent response once you read this mail.

YOURS SINCERELY. CHIEF JUSTICE OF THE SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES.
HON. JOHN G. ROBERTS JR
Email:  supremecourtofunitedstate15567@gmail.com

<buffet110201@gmail.com>

subject: Re: SUPREME HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE
body:
Hello Hon. John G. Roberts Jr,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed options you've provided to receive the fund. It's quite a surprise and I'm still trying to wrap my head around it.

Could you please provide more information about these methods? For instance, in the Bank to Bank wire transfer, how secure is this method? And for the ATM Card delivery, how will I be able to withdraw such a large amount daily?

As for the Box Delivery option, it sounds intriguing but I'm curious about its safety measures. How can we ensure that no one else knows what's inside it?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Janet

subject: Re: SUPREME HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE
body:

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the bank to bank wire transfer and ATM card delivery. It's really interesting to know that such large amounts can be transferred so easily.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind me asking. How does the Federal Reserve Bank assure the security of these transfers? And how is it possible to fit millions of dollars into an ATM card?

Also, could you please provide more information about the banking service charge and delivery cost? I would like to understand these charges better before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,

subject: Re: SUPREME HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE
